DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether aerobic train intervention alter marker immune cell aging , improve exercise capacity blood pressure decrease psychological distress 24 week 32 caregiver compare 32 age-matched wait list control caregiver .
DOC.brief_title: Fitness , Cellular Aging , Caregiver Stress Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator prospectively examine whether aerobic train intervention alter marker immune cell age ( i.e . increase telomerase activity peripheral blood mononuclear cell , telomere length peripheral blood mononuclear cell leukocytes , mitochondrial function , epigenetic profile , mRNA expression ) , improve exercise capacity blood pressure , decrease psychological distress 24 week 32 caregiver compare 32 age-matched wait list control caregiver . Our sample comprise caregiver provide unpaid care family member diagnose Alzheimer 's disease dementia . Participants study highly stress inactive male female caregiver family member Alzheimer 's disease dementia . All eligible participant complete one week ecological momentary assessment ( EMA ) examine whether ( 1 ) previously unfit , high-stressed caregiver benefit psychologically become active , ( 2 ) benefit derive change caregiver react recover stressful event , ( 3 ) whether salubrious psychological effect mediate change biological outcome ( e.g. , cellular age ) . Next , participant participate one-week run-in period stretch 30 minute 4 separate day prior randomization guarantee investigator randomize well-informed participant willing able complete expect exercise . Next , participant randomize aerobic exercise wait list control arm . In 24th week study , participant complete second week EMAs sub-study , return week 24 final blood draw . Research study assessment consist self-report questionnaire , body composition , physical performance fitness test , fast blood draw . The follow-up visit , 24 week later , consist repeat morning health visit .
DOC.criteria: Age : 5075 Men Women ( woman must postmenopausal ) Body Mass Index must 40 ( exclude extreme obesity , confound outcome ) Must first second degree family member provide unpaid caregiving adult relative Alzheimer 's disease dementia longer 6 month since diagnosis . Must report provide care 10 hour per week . Perceived stress ≥ 15 adult 65 old ; Perceived stress ≥ 18 adult aged 5064 . ( 0.5 standard deviation national average adult ) Do meet Center Disease Control recommendation exercise ( 150 minute per week moderate activity level 75 minute vigorous ) Major Chronic Disease interfere activity level advise medical practitioner ( Autoimmune disorder ; severe asthma ; lung disease emphysema chronic bronchitis ; history stroke , heart attack , cardiovascular disease , epilepsy , brain injury ) Heart attack past 6 month repeat experience chest pain pressure , and/or arrhythmia . Cancer remission . Those underwent chemotherapy radiation within past 5 year exclude . Eating Disorders Current substance dependence interfere activity engagement . Current Post Traumatic Stress Disorder Current recent smoking status . We exclude current smoker past smoker ( quit within past 5 year ) . Confounding medication Oral Steroids contain prescription drug use drug might interfere outcome measure . Current major injury Any physical impairment prevent participation moderate level physical activity ( e.g . musculoskeletal problem , prosthesis ) Inability walk block climb stair without chest pain , lose breath , dizziness
